metadata.name: Cursed Heart
metadata.description:
Cursed Heart Quality: 4 Cost: Two Red Hearts Item Pools: Devil Room and Ultra Secret Room Transformation: Leviathan +0.5 Damage x2.3 Fire rate multiplier +2 Black Hearts You take double damage Homing tears - Additional copies grant +2.5 Damage - Unique demon appearance
Future updates are welcome Github download for Epic Games, GOG, Cracked, etc https://github.com/Yumilli/CursedHeart
